features: 【24 POCKETS WITH TABS】The accordion file folders has a total of 12 binder, each binder has pockets on both sides, it can be used on both sides, you can get a total of 24 binder folders with pockets. Each folders has raised labels, and the added rainbow coloured tabs in clear colours to help you better organise and find your files!

【PORTABLE FILE FOLDERS】Folders with pockets are standard letter size, each pocket can store up to 50 pages of paper. The plastic folder organizer prevents the folder from wrinkling, its very durable and sturdy for easy portability. There are two elasticated cords at the top and bottom of Plastic Folders with Pockets for fastening. There are clear pockets on the front of the folder for easy insertion of instructions.

【MULTIPLE COLORS & EASY TO FIND】The 12 binder of the accordion folder have individual colors: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple etc. Multi Colors binders make it easy to categorize files, with the colours corresponding to the colours inside the folder, making it easy for you to remember and find.

【SCOPE OF APPLICATION】Folders keep all paper and data organized. Folders with pockets are perfect for home, office, high school and college. The file organizer can be used in business situations, and can also be stacked in a cabinet or organized vertically.

【QUALITY ASSURANCE】HABGP is a professional folder manufacturer, our products are designed to be convenient for customers to use. This folders with pockets and binder is our classic product, if you have any questions about it, please contact us, we will give you a satisfactory answer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Durable Waterproof Material Made of waterproof polyester and polypropylene (PP) to avoid any form of deformation or fracture Coloured tabs Rainbow coloured tabs in clear colours to help you better organise and find your files! Elastic straps 2 elastic straps design on the surface , protect your files from falling down. Inside folder organizer Inside of the folder organizer has enough space to hold a large number of paper documents.

Appropriate Size - 24 Pockets, 12 dividers, It can hold 250 sheets of A4 papers. Labels on The Cover - 12 colour labels on the front cover corresponding to the colours inside the folder, making it easy for you to remember and find. Colored Labels - 12 individual pockets Color page notes which help to classify files easily and conveniently secure contents. Insert bag design - Fashion, easy to store files and suitable as a present

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this product because it helps me to organize important paperwork - each folder is used to store different types of information - paperwork is easy to store and makes it easy to locate information when you need you need it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for those with ADHD - Great price, easy to use, very attractive
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a good way to keep all of my business receipts together each year. This folder is perfect for the task. The quality is good, and it looks exactly like the picture. The price is excellent. I really like the rainbow colors and the fact that it has one set of pockets per each of the 12 months. As someone with ADHD, I need tools that help me organize myself in visual and simple ways. I highly recommend this to customize for similar purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and creative
reviews.reviewText: I like the twelve different tabs with color coding indicators on the exterior. Overall, not quite as roomy as I'd hoped, but very handy and efficient. Family well constructed so should last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: If you just need a basic expandable folder with 12 divider pockets for storing papers, there's some definite overkill involved here - plastic divider sheets with (too small) tabs, two plastic sheet holders in each section to keep important papers separate, 12 cutouts on the front cover to enter more information, plus numeral 1-12 cutouts on the front cover that don't seem to serve any real purpose. And an elastic cord that holds the top and bottom corners together. This will do an OK job for home use, but I think most business people would rather have a functional but less flashy storage device. I would not take this to a business meeting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great folder. I put user manuals in the folders, that come with appliances and electronics and tools. Plastic material and has indexes. The 12 tabs and color coding makes it easy to organize my way. So many possible variations for organizing your way. The folder is well made and feels durable. As long as you don't overstuff the pockets this should last several years. Affordable when i went and looked at what these costs. I recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly Functional and Vibrant!
reviews.reviewText: This was more than I had hoped for! Very nice and heavy duty material, plenty large pockets, and the colors on the tabs and front are wonderful; easily distinguishable if you are a color coder! This is going to be used for our 2024 receipts and documents that will be needed for next time we do taxes...and I am certain we will be using this for years to come This has quickly become one of my favorite office items!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds more paper that it first appears to
reviews.reviewText: Well made plastic file folder. You can slide the paper strip out to write the tabbed titles on. Once you add papers into the inside pockets, the outside expands much more than it first appears. The ends of the elastic which holds it closed has metal grips on the ends. They appear to be well made and so far seem to be holding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 12 Slot/Color 24 Pocket File Organizer, Elastic Cords for Closure, Pockets Should be Deeper
reviews.reviewText: File organizer with 12 colors/pages, 24 pockets. Has elastic cords to keep it closed. Labels are on a piece of paper that can slide out. It can expand a little in the back, so it should be able to hold up to about 100 pieces of paper total in the 24 pockets (4-5 in each.) The only issue I have with the folder is the pockets are pretty shallow, if the pockets were about 3 inches deeper, things would be a bit more secure if you have smaller than page sized items in the pockets. Otherwise, I like the folder, seems well constructed and lightweight.
